text: Lingua Franca Nova has similar grammar to the Haitian Creole, Papiamento, and Afrikaans. It also uses vocabulary from modern romance languages, like Portuguese, Spanish, Catalan, French, and Italian. Lingua Franca Nova's official website has grammar explanations in many languages: LFN, German, English, Spanish, Esperanto, French, Italian, Polish, Russian, and Finnish. ==Other websites== * Complete grammar on the official website Category:Lingua Franca Nova Category:Grammars of specific languages
